search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Pure Chat (pure-chat.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Pure Chat can be found at: https://www.purechat.com/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
The easiest & fastest way to add live chat to your website. Try the PRO plan for FREE for 30 days!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

| Max Websites | 1 | Unlimited |

Know about Live Chat Software pricing with Pure Chat. Get powerful communication tools to engage customers and boost conversions with us. Call us!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes options for annual and monthly billing, with additional fees for extra users/operators.

features: Security Roles (Admin, Power Users, and Operators)
